name: Medicham
description: It is said that through meditation, MEDICHAM heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.

abilities.name: Pure Power
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Attack is doubled in battle.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  This ability functions identically to huge power.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
